Edges-Background -- Male Human Medieval Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (11 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d10 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes:
Brave: +2 Spirit vs. fear
Brawny: +1 Strength step (encumbrance and minimum strength requirements)
Skills (30 Points):
Boating: (agi) d6 Knowledge (Language (Avion)): (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4+2
Climbing: (str) d4 Knowledge (Language (Dwarf)): (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6+3
Faith: (spi) d4 Knowledge (Language (Elf)): (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d4 Knowledge (Language (Half-Elf)): (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Gambling: (sma) d4 Knowledge (Language (Half-Folk)): (sma) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Intimidation: (spi) d4 Knowledge (Language (Half-Orc)): (sma) d4 Swimming: (agi) d4
Knowledge (Language (Android)): (sma) d4 Knowledge (Language (Rakashan)): (sma) d4 Taunt: (sma) d6
Knowledge (Language (Atlantean)): (sma) d4 Lockpicking: (agi) d8 Weird Science: (sma) d6
Skill Notes:
Alertness: +2 Notice
Attractive: +4 Charisma
Charisma: +3 Persuasion/+3 Streetwise
Habit: -1 Charisma
Linguist: +8 Skill Points (d4 in in 8 Knowledge (Language) skills), Smarts-2 to understand other familiar tongues
Noble: +2 Charisma
Ugly: -2 Charisma
Very Attractive: Increased Attractive effects
Size: 0 Deity: None
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 12; Edge: 6; Skill: 10
Features
Edges (5 points): Alertness; Ambidextrous; Arcane Background (Magic); Arcane Background (Miracles); Arcane Background (Psionics); Arcane Background (Super Powers); Arcane Background (Weird Science); Arcane Resistance; Attractive; Berserk; Brave; Brawny; Fast Healer; Filthy Rich; Fleet-Footed; Great Luck; Improved Arcane Resistance; Linguist; Luck; Noble; Quick; Rich; Very Attractive Hindrances: Enemy; Habit; Quirk; Ugly Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Filthy Rich: Increased Rich effects
Great Luck: Increased Luck effects
Noble: Has Rich feature
Enemy: Individual or remote group wants character eliminated
Habit: Has irritating but harmless compulsion
Luck: +2 Benny each session
Quirk: Has minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Rich: 5x starting funds
Combat
Parry: 4 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (1) Pace/Run: 8/+d10
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Axe: 1 (d8+d6); Great Axe: 1 (d8+d10); Unarmed: 1 (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Brawny: +1 Toughness
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Fleet-Footed: +2 Pace/+2 Run step
Improved Arcane Resistance: Increased Arcane Resistance effects
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Ambidextrous: No off-hand penalty
Arcane Resistance: -4 others' targeted arcane skill, -4 magical damage
Berserk: Injury causes +2 Fighting, Strength, melee damage, and Toughness, -2 Parry , ignore Wound penalties, and 1 on Fighting die hits randomly (Smarts-2 neg)
Fast Healer: +2 Vigor (natural healing)
Great Axe Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
Quick: Discard and redraw Action Cards lower than 6
